user_stories.title: Create BACKLOG.md during init
user_stories.as_a: developer installing iSDLC into a new project
user_stories.i_want: a BACKLOG.md file to be created automatically at the project root with the correct section headers
user_stories.so_that: I have a ready-to-use backlog file that follows the framework's format convention without manual setup

user_stories.title: Preserve existing BACKLOG.md
user_stories.as_a: developer reinstalling or upgrading iSDLC in an existing project
user_stories.i_want: the installer to skip BACKLOG.md creation if the file already exists
user_stories.so_that: my existing backlog items are not overwritten during reinstall

user_stories.title: Dry-run does not create BACKLOG.md
user_stories.i_want: BACKLOG.md to not be written to disk during dry-run mode
user_stories.so_that: dry-run remains a preview-only operation with no side effects

user_stories.title: Uninstaller preserves BACKLOG.md
user_stories.as_a: developer uninstalling iSDLC from a project
user_stories.i_want: BACKLOG.md to remain untouched after uninstall
user_stories.so_that: my backlog data is never lost when removing the framework
